Cube.name: Access to Exercise
Cube.Annotation: Access to exercise opportunities by county
North Carolina Rankings Data (Ranked Measure Data)
Percentage of the population living half a mile from a park in any area, one mile from a recreational center in a metropolitan area, or three miles from a recreational center in a rural area

Cube.name: Access Healthy Food
Cube.Annotation: Access to healthy food by tract
Percentage of people who are low-income that are not in close proximity to a grocery store

Cube.name: Binge Drinking
Cube.Annotation: PLACES: Local Data for Better Health (Census Tract Data)
Percent of adults reporting binge or heavy drinking

Cube.name: HIV Diagnoses
Cube.Annotation: National Center for HIV/AIDS, Viral Hepatitis, STD, and TB Prevention (AtlasPlus Data)
Number of new HIV diagnoses per 100,000 population

Cube.name: Incarcerated Population
Cube.Annotation: Office of Research and Planning (Automated System Query Custom Offender Reports)

Cube.name: Infant Mortality
Cube.Annotation: N.C. Department of Health & Human Services
N.C. State Center for Health Statistics (Detailed Mortality Statistics)
Rate of infant deaths per 1,000 live births

Cube.name: Life expectancy
Cube.Annotation: National Center for Health Statistics (U.S. Small-Area Life Expectancy Estimates Project Files)
Average number of years of life remaining

Cube.name: Prenatal Care
Cube.Annotation: N.C. Department of Health & Human Services
N.C. State Center for Health Statistics (Live Birth Data)
Percent of women who receive pregnancy- related health care services during the first trimester of a pregnancy

Cube.name: Overdose Deaths
Cube.Annotation: N.C. Department of Health & Human Services
N.C. State Center for Health Statistics (Detailed Mortality Statistics)
Number of persons who die as a result of drug poisoning per 100,000 population

Cube.name: Short Term Suspensions
Cube.Annotation: Discipline, ALP and Dropout Annual Reports (Suspension Tables)
Number of out-of-school short-term suspensions in educational facilities for all grades per 10 students

Cube.name: Sugar Sweetened Beverages
Cube.Annotation: Novant Health New Hanover Regional Medical Center
Diabetes Patient Registry (Aggregate Census Tract Data)
Percent of youth and adults reporting consumption of one or more sugar- sweetened beverages (SSBs) per day

Cube.name: Suicides
Cube.Annotation: N.C. Department of Health & Human Services
N.C. State Center for Health Statistics (Detailed Mortality Statistics)
Age-adjusted number of deaths attributable to self-harm per 100,000 population

Cube.name: Teen Births
Cube.Annotation: N.C. Department of Health & Human Services
N.C. State Center for Health Statistics (Live Birth Data)
Number of births to girls aged 15-19 per 1,000 population

Cube.name: Tobacco Use
Cube.Annotation: PLACES: Local Data for Better Health (Census Tract Data)
Percent of youth and adults reporting current use of e-cigarettes, cigarettes, cigars, smokeless tobacco, pipes, and/or hookah
